%1 is required: Honeypot captcha creates hidden field which is usually filled by simple spam bots. This feature can dramatically decrease spam submissions at no cost to customer comfort

%1 is required:
Following codes pre-fill data for registered customer:
{{email}} - customer e-mail address
{{firstname}} - first name of the customer
{{lastname}} - last name of the customer
{{company}} - illing profile company
{{city}} - billing profile city
{{street}} - billing profile street
{{country_id}} - billing profile country 2 symbol code
{{region}} - billing profile region
{{postcode}} - billing profile postcode
{{telephone}} - billing profile telephone
{{fax}} - billing profile fax
%1 est obligatoire:
"Les champs suivants pré remplissent les données des utilsateurs enregistrés:
{{email}} - adresse e-mail du client
{{firstname}} - prénom du client
{{lastname}} - nom du client
{{company}} - entreprise de facturation
{{city}} - ville de facturation
{{street}} - rue de facturation
{{country_id}} - Code de 2 symbole de la ville de facturation
{{region}} - région de facturation
{{postcode}} - code postale de facturation<
{{telephone}} - téléphone de facturation<
{{fax}} - fax de facturation<"
